metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Order Picker Packer
content:
Chewy Pharmacy is hiring with starting wages up to $18.75 per hour
Our Opportunity:
Chewy, America’s #1 pet pharmacy, is seeking Order Picker Packers to join our amazing team! There are several reasons why people choose to work and stay at Chewy – competitive pay, great perks, a supportive culture, and, oh yeah, the ability to make pets, pet parents, and pet partners super happy! For these reasons and many more, we would love for you to consider applying so we can share more about the great opportunities we have for you!
Why you’ll love working here:

Competitive pay and benefits
You will focus on excellence and take pride and great care in everything you do
We have a culture of belonging where you will feel valued for your skills and contributions, and be recognized for your commitment and hard work
Extra incentives include referral bonuses ($500 per referral), 20% discount program for all your pet needs at Chewy, and more
We’ll empower you to build, grow, and unleash your full potential!

What you’ll do:

Warehouse functions including anything from in-bounding and storing inventory in warehouse, filling prescription orders, data entry, picking, and sending shipments to pet parents
Fulfill and organize orders to ensure the customer delivery process is efficient and accurate
Create accurate shipping documentation for domestic shipments

What you’ll need:

Must be at least 18 years old.
The desire to take great pride and care in every order you fill for our pet parents (customers).
Great attention to detail when filling Pharmacy orders
Ability to stand for extending periods of time, walking up to 2 miles per shift and lift up to 25lbs pounds either with or without reasonable accommodations
Flexibility for overtime opportunities
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

questions.label: Are you 18 years of age or older?
Have you been employed by Chewy in the past?

If you were hired at Chewy, what shift would you prefer to work? Day (Morning start time) or Night (Evening Start Time)? Your preference will be taken into consideration should you be selected for the role, but we cannot guarantee that we will be able to accommodate your request.

values.label: Open to Day or Night Shift

questions.label: Are you legally authorized to work in the United States without employer support or sponsorship?
Are you willing to submit a post-offer, pre-employment background check and drug test?
How did you hear about Chewy?
Will you require sponsorship to work in the United States at any time in the future?

questions.description: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *
questions.label: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *

By clicking “Acknowledge/Confirm” on this form, you agree to receive emails, text messages and calls about your potential employment with Chewy, including this job application, interviewing, and onboarding, as well as your relationship with us, by or on behalf of Chewy, including via automated technology and artificial or pre-recorded voice, at the telephone number provided above. Msg & data rates may apply. Subject to our Terms of Use (https://careers.chewy.com/terms)  and Privacy Policy (https://www.chewy.com/app/content/privacy). Opt-out from these messages at any time by replying STOP to any message from us. Texting STOP to one shortcode will not effectuate a stop request for all shortcodes to which you are subscribed.
